title: Advanced Combat Techniques
info: Advanced Combat Techniques is a consumable obtained by fishing during a Blood Moon. It can only be used once per world, and others cannot be fished up once one has already been used. However, multiple copies can be obtained until the first is used.
stat:
Type
Consumable
Use time45 (Very slow)
TooltipIncreases the defense and strength of all villagers
'Contains offensive and defensive fighting techniques'
Rarity02*
Research1 required
